summary: The 'Stop Funding Religiously Oppressive Regimes Act of 2025' introduced in the Senate aims to prohibit U.S. financial aid to foreign governments that violate religious freedom. It mandates the President to identify countries with laws imposing severe criminal penalties (death or life imprisonment) for apostasy, blasphemy, or interfaith marriage. Once identified, these governments will be ineligible to receive U.S. assistance.
